thread.section_title: The Nadler Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel with a fine location
thread.title_full: Nice hotel with a fine location - Review of The Nadler Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Koltrip
title: Nice hotel with a fine location
text:
Booked at this hotel for a group of 12 people for 3-4 nights. They have a varity of different rooms with or without bathroom.
Rooms are clean and nice. The bed in our room was ok, but the mattres a little hard. I think it is time to change it.
The fine thing is that there is a small kitchenette with the room. Location is only a short walk from Earls Court underground.
For a prize of 200 pound it is too expencive, but it is possible to get it cheaper.
No view from our room. The staff are friendly and helpful. Overall a good experience!
